text: "Baby Wants to Rock" is a 1984 song by Australian pop rock band Mondo Rock and is the second single from their fourth studio album The Modern Bop. It went to number 18 in Australia. == Track listings == ;Aus 7" Single # "Baby Wants to Rock" - 4:29 # "Winds Light to Variable" - 4:14 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Mondo Rock songs
title: Baby Wants to Rock
